dictionary.introducing:
byteRunner | Developed by Matrzak Welcome, byteRunner is a game which has one major objective. The Goal is to find a serial killer, murderer himself leaves leads which with appropriate use can be usefully.
Unfortunately, detective bureau from local police department cant handle it. They announce money reward for person who's gonna help department with arrest of this criminal.
Character which you are going to be is worldwide famous hacker called "byteRunner" which decide to help police department.
Game is written gradually, what does it means? After completing first stage game will download next level by itself from remote server.
dictionary.skills_:
List of skills that can be useful during the game. => Logical thinking => Coding (JS,PYTHON,C++) => Cryptography => Bash/Unix
(Game require internet connection to download next stages after completing each one)
dictionary.start: It is time to begin with our adventure! Run game with -herewego argument to start next stage!
dictionary.dle: All good! Run stage1.exe to continue adventrue!
